body_html:
@wangsiyu It supports both synchronous and asynchronous training depending on whether you use SyncReplicaOptimizer in the model function. Please note that we haven't officially released them since we haven't tested it with enough use cases.

The MirroredStrategy works with eager mode for multi-GPU but we haven't tuned its performance yet.

We use threads not just for eager mode. They also serve as a trick to call several model_fns and add synchronization subgraphs between them.

Closing this issue but still feel free to ask questions.

body:
@wangsiyu It supports both synchronous and asynchronous training depending on whether you use SyncReplicaOptimizer in the model function. Please note that we haven't officially released them since we haven't tested it with enough use cases.

The MirroredStrategy works with eager mode for multi-GPU but we haven't tuned its performance yet.

We use threads not just for eager mode. They also serve as a trick to call several `model_fn`s and add synchronization subgraphs between them.

Closing this issue but still feel free to ask questions.
